channel.title: The SCCM blog of Quentin Escott
channel.description: Recent content on The SCCM blog of Quentin Escott

item.title: My First Post
item.description: I thought it would be apt for my first SCCM post to talk about the first Microsoft KB that me and my team had created. It was KB4465865. We were upto date with our SCCM install (Current Branch 1806) so we were able to get the Microsft engineering team to make a hot fix for us. It took many hours on the phone.
